candidates.plantuml:
@startuml
left to right direction
actor 用户

usecase "启动图形编辑器" as UC1
usecase "创建图形" as UC2
usecase "选择图形" as UC3
usecase "删除图形" as UC4
usecase "调整图形尺寸" as UC5
usecase "移动图形" as UC6
usecase "创建图层" as UC7
usecase "切换图层" as UC8
usecase "创建自定义图形" as UC9

用户 --> UC1
用户 --> UC2
用户 --> UC3
用户 --> UC4
用户 --> UC5
用户 --> UC6
用户 --> UC7
用户 --> UC8

' 当需要支持新的图形种类时，扩展创建图形功能
UC2 <|-- UC9
@enduml

@startuml left to right direction
actor 用户

usecase "启动图形编辑器" as UC1
usecase "创建图形" as UC2
usecase "选择图形" as UC3
usecase "删除图形" as UC4

usecase "创建图层" as UC7
usecase "管理图层" as UC8
usecase "创建自定义图形" as UC9

用户 --> UC1

用户 --> UC3
用户 --> UC4
用户 --> UC5
用户 --> UC6
用户 --> UC7
用户 --> UC8

' 扩展创建图形功能以支持自定义图形类型
UC2 <|-- UC9 : extend
@enduml

@startuml left to right direction
actor 用户 as User

usecase 启动图形编辑器 as UC1
usecase 创建图形 as UC2
usecase 选择图形 as UC3
usecase 删除图形 as UC4
usecase 调整图形尺寸 as UC5
usecase 移动图形 as UC6
usecase 创建图层 as UC7
usecase 切换图层 as UC8
usecase 创建自定义图形 as UC9

User --> UC2
User --> UC3
User --> UC4
User --> UC5
User --> UC6
User --> UC7
User --> UC8

' 可扩展新的图形类型以支持自定义图形创建
UC2 <|-- UC9
@enduml

@startuml
left to right direction
actor User as U

usecase "启动图形编辑器" as UC1
usecase "创建图形" as UC2
usecase "选择图形" as UC3
usecase "删除图形" as UC4
usecase "调整图形尺寸" as UC5
usecase "移动图形" as UC6
usecase "创建图层" as UC7
usecase "切换图层" as UC8
usecase "创建自定义图形" as UC9

U --> UC1
U --> UC2
U --> UC3
U --> UC4
U --> UC5
U --> UC6
U --> UC7
U --> UC8

UC6 include UC3

' 当需要扩展图形种类时，可扩展创建自定义图形功能

@enduml

@startuml
actor 用户

usecase "启动图形编辑器" as UC1
usecase "创建图形" as UC2
usecase "选择图形" as UC3
usecase "删除图形" as UC4
usecase "调整图形尺寸" as UC5
usecase "移动图形" as UC6
usecase "创建图层" as UC7
usecase "切换图层" as UC8
usecase "扩展创建新图形类型" as UC9

' 用户可执行所有核心功能
用户 --> UC1
用户 --> UC2
用户 --> UC3
用户 --> UC4
用户 --> UC5
用户 --> UC6
用户 --> UC7
用户 --> UC8

' 删除图形需先选择图形，但约束禁止使用include关系
' 调整图形尺寸需先选择图形，但约束禁止使用include关系
' 移动图形需先选择图形，但约束禁止使用include关系

' 根据约束，图形编辑器可扩展创建的图形种类
UC2 <|.. UC9 : 当需要支持新图形种类时扩展
@enduml

candidates.plantuml:
left to right direction
actor User as U

usecase "初始启动软件" as UC1
usecase "创建图形" as UC2
usecase "选择图形" as UC3
usecase "删除图形" as UC4
usecase "调整图形尺寸" as UC5
usecase "移动图形" as UC6
usecase "创建图层" as UC7
usecase "管理图层" as UC8
usecase "创建直线" as UC21
usecase "创建椭圆" as UC22
usecase "创建矩形" as UC23

U --> UC1
U --> UC2
U --> UC3
U --> UC4
U --> UC5
U --> UC6
U --> UC7
U --> UC8

' 选择直线时扩展创建图形功能，符合图形种类可扩展约束
UC21 --|> UC2 : extend
' 选择椭圆时扩展创建图形功能，符合图形种类可扩展约束
UC22 --|> UC2 : extend
' 选择矩形时扩展创建图形功能，符合图形种类可扩展约束
UC23 --|> UC2 : extend

' 移动图形必须包含选择图形，遵循must_include约束
UC6 .> UC3 : include
@enduml

candidates.plantuml:
@startuml
actor "Graphic Editor User" as EditorUser

usecase "启动图形编辑器" as UC_Start
usecase "创建自定义图形" as UC_CreateCustom
usecase "选择图形" as UC_Select
usecase "删除图形" as UC_Delete
usecase "调整图形尺寸" as UC_Resize
usecase "移动图形" as UC_Move
usecase "创建图层" as UC_CreateLayer
usecase "切换图层" as UC_SwitchLayer

EditorUser --> UC_Start
EditorUser --> UC_CreateCustom
EditorUser --> UC_Select
EditorUser --> UC_Delete
EditorUser --> UC_Resize
EditorUser --> UC_Move
EditorUser --> UC_CreateLayer
EditorUser --> UC_SwitchLayer

' 图形种类可扩展，符合约束要求
note right of UC_CreateCustom: 支持扩展新增图形类型
@enduml

@startuml
actor GraphicDesigner as GD

usecase "启动图形编辑器" as UC_Start
usecase "创建自定义图形" as UC_CreateShape
usecase "选择图形" as UC_SelectShape
usecase "删除图形" as UC_DeleteShape
usecase "调整图形尺寸" as UC_ResizeShape
usecase "移动图形" as UC_MoveShape
usecase "创建图层" as UC_CreateLayer
usecase "切换图层" as UC_SwitchLayer

' 扩展创建图形种类以支持新增图形类型
UC_CreateShape <|-- UC_ExtendShapeType : extend (新增图形种类时触发)

GD --> UC_Start
GD --> UC_CreateShape
GD --> UC_SelectShape
GD --> UC_DeleteShape
GD --> UC_ResizeShape
GD --> UC_MoveShape
GD --> UC_CreateLayer
GD --> UC_SwitchLayer
@enduml
